contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of August, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to that court for reconsideration in light of Commonwealth v. Castro, 625 Pa. 582, 93 A.3d 818 (2014). Jurisdiction relinquished.
